text: Tum unse muhabbat rakhte ho magar woh tumse muhabbat nahin rakhte, halaanke tum tamaam kutoob e asmaani ko maante ho. Jab woh tumse milte hain to kehte hain ke humne bhi (tumhare Rasool aur tumhari kitab ko) maan liya hai, magar jab juda hotey hain to tumhare khilaf unke gaiz o gazab ka yeh haal hota hai ke apni ungliyan chabane lagte hain. Unsey kehdo ke apne gussey mein aap jal maro, Allah dilon ke chupey huey raaz tak jaanta hai
